name: branding
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of making a product, organization, person, or place easy to recognize as different from others by connecting it with a particular name, design, symbol, set of qualities, etc.: The successful branding and marketing of the new beer has already boosted sales. The concept of personal branding is extremely important to social media influencers. a branding strategy/consultant
the design, symbols, colours, etc. that people connect with a particular product or company: We produce a wide range of merchandise that can be customized with your corporate branding. The organizers are offering sponsors prominent branding during the championship.
More examplesFewer examplesAt this stage in the project we primarily focus on branding.A clear understanding of branding strategy is essential in order to build product lines.The study suggests that young children are highly influenced by branding.Think about what message you are trying to put across with your branding.The branding on the packaging was so subtle that it was easy to miss.

MARKETING, COMMERCE the activity of connecting a product with a particular name, symbol, etc. or with particular features or ideas, in order to make people recognize and want to buy it: Successful branding uses design to reinforce customers' visual memories. If you are aiming for a more mass market you may need to take a new look at your branding. Last month the company launched an aggressive new branding campaign on national TV. By applying a branding strategy, the company has fortified its position in the face of growing competition. a branding expert/firm/agency
